name: Knight & Day
description:
Submission for University of Texas at Dallas Student Game Developer Association Spring 2023 Game Jam.

Play as a Knight captured by the evil army of night creatures, used as training fodder each day by their forces. Survive the day as waves of monsters pursue you through their fortress. Spend each night arming yourself for the day ahead to try and overpower your captors. Can you survive the night army's hordes.

How to Play:

During the day you will face a horde of enemies.

During the night, you must explore in order to find health potions and new weapons. When you find a weapon, press E to equip. For starters, there will be a sword in front of your cell.

Press P to pause game
